mapper.insert: insert into orders(ordersid , ordercode , usersid , goodsid , sellerid , price , num , total , addtime , status , receiver , address , contact ) values(#{ordersid} , #{ordercode} , #{usersid} , #{goodsid} , #{sellerid} , #{price} , #{num} , #{total} , #{addtime} , #{status} , #{receiver} , #{address} , #{contact} )
mapper.update: update orders set ordercode=#{ordercode} , usersid=#{usersid} , goodsid=#{goodsid} , sellerid=#{sellerid} , price=#{price} , num=#{num} , total=#{total} , addtime=#{addtime} , status=#{status} , receiver=#{receiver} , address=#{address} , contact=#{contact} where ordersid=#{ordersid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.username , c.goodsname , d.shopname from orders a , users b , goods c , seller d where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.goodsid = c.goodsid and a.sellerid = d.sellerid order by ordersid desc

select a.* , b.username , c.goodsname , d.shopname from orders a , users b , goods c , seller d where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.goodsid = c.goodsid and a.sellerid = d.sellerid and ordersid=#{ordersid} order by ordersid desc
